name: Ashok Kumar Chokkapu
designation: Full Stack Developer ( 9 years of experience )
about: I am a passionate Full Stack Web Developer with 9 years of experience. Over the past 9 years, I have been dedicated to developing full-stack web applications using , React.js, TypeScript, Java, Spring Boot, Node.js, GraphQL and MySQL Database. Additionally, I have significant expertise in Angular and AWS Cloud service

projects.title: A Hybrid Graph Based Neural Network for Neurological Disorder Detection From EEG
desc: The EEG signal based detection for ND diagnosis has employed a variety of deep learning based models.
This project aims to develop a framework based on hybrid graph neural network considering spatio temporal EEG brain waves

projects.title: Covid Care
desc: COVID CARE is a software product and web application, which provide related information about Covid, and developed one feature that is Chabot. It has the ability to interact with users.
I took on the role of a front-end developer and actively collaborated with my teammates. One of my major contributions was designing the algorithm for the chatbot services
